page.title: 01WOOLLEY, STRETTON, HANDLEY
page.content:
This area is mentioned in the 1086 {Domesday Book}as{Oughedestune.
The main features of this pleasant rural area are{Ogston Reservoir}and the small farms.The land is mainly planted grassland rather than crops. The main village is{Woolley Moor, an active village where residents have family connections spanning generations. When young people get married they stay in the village if at all possible. { There is one small school called {Stretton Handley CE Primary School which is situated in Woolley Moor. The work that the school did for the Domesday Project was made into a display in school which local people came to see.
